EmailTemplate.description: Use to send Customer a Spares PO Checklist
EmailTemplate.name: Honeywell Spares PO Requirements
EmailTemplate.subject: Important! Updated Purchase Order Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are unable to enter your order due to missing information on your purchase order.
Please send a new or revised purchase order that includes the below information:
<insert text here>
A purchase order (PO) checklist is included for your convenience. Getting all information from the beginning will minimize delays and avoid Honeywell contacting you for additional information.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
